hero.title: I AM THE ONE
hero.description: The new Titan ONE one-piece innovation. Eyewear at the pinnacle of design.

box2.body: Natural lines form a harmonious unity between the wearer and the eyewear

points.title: One-Piece-Innovation
points.body: Integrates nose bridge and temples in one piece

points.title: High-Tech-Titanium
points.body: Strong, yet extremely lightweight and soft

stories.headline: „GOOD DESIGN IS ALWAYS AUTHENTIC“
stories.subheadline: Henrietta Thompson, Editor-at-Large at Wallpaper magazine
stories.longtext: For Henrietta Thompson, good design is always authentic, however this must not detract from the enjoyment of the product. This is also the case with the Titan ONE, which brings the personality of the wearer to the fore and allows it to shine through.
stories.name: Henrietta

stories.headline: „SUCCESSFULLY BALANCING THE EXPERIMENTAL WITH THE PRACTICAL“
stories.subheadline: Alvin Huang, Founder and Design Principal of Synthesis Design + Architecture
stories.longtext: Alvin Huang is passionate about investigating novel and expressive forms that challenge design conventions and are informed by structural, fabrication, and optical criteria. He is of the “form follows performance” school and regards design in this aspect. He describes Titan ONE as the epitome of expressing more with less.
stories.link: Read the interview with Alvin Huang
stories.name: Huang

stories.headline: „DESIGN AS AN EXERCISE IN CREATING VALUE“
stories.subheadline: Jonas Ravlo Stokke and Oystein Austad, Designer & Founder of Stokke Austad
stories.longtext: Revealing the essence of each design the trained industrial designers focus on creating holistic and durable solutions. Both intensively studied the one-piece phenomenon, as with their own designs and were among the first to get in touch with Titan ONE.
stories.name: Austad

stories.headline: „MINIMIZING SYMBOLS TO MAXIMIZE SIGNIFICANCE AND RELEVANCE“
stories.subheadline: Eisuke Tachikawa, Architect, Designer and Founder of NOSIGNER
stories.longtext: At his Studio Nosigner in Tokyo, Eisuke Tachikawa grapples primarily with designs that can positively change society and the future. In terms of the minimal amount of material used, Titan ONE is a sustainable design concept. Not only is its unique design convincing, but so is its timeless presence.
stories.name: Tachikawa

wisdom.title: THE WISDOM OF THE ONE
wisdom.description: Vision, intelligence, creativity, ingenuity - the Titan ONE combines all of these. Every ONE projects those values into the world.

quotes.quote1: THE ONE IS PART OF YOU, AS YOU ARE PART OF IT.
quotes.quote1_author: adapted from Plotinus, extract. R. Harder, Ffm, 1958, page 75
quotes.quote2: THE ONE BRINGS HAPPINESS AND ERADICATES DOUBT.
quotes.quote2_author: adapted from the Third Patriarch of Zen, in Huxley, The Perennial Philosophy, page 110
quotes.quote3: THE ONE IS NOT SECOND BEST; IT IS THE MOST MEANINGFUL.
quotes.quote3_author: adapted from John Maeda, Laws of simplicity, Law 10: The ONE
quotes.quote4: THE ONE IS THE SIMPLICITY THAT UNIFIES DIVERSITY AND OFFERS AN INFINITE NUMBER OF POSSIBILITIES.
quotes.quote4_author: adapted from Plotinus, extract. R. Harder, Ffm, 1958, page 75
